sentences.sContent: This article reviews the applications of heuristic didactics to pharmacology teaching.
sentences.sContent_eng: This article reviews the applications of heuristic didactics to pharmacology teaching.
sentences.sCn: 对启发式教学法在药理学教学中的应用进行了论述。

sentences.sContent: The key feature of discussion didactics is the discussion between students guided by teacher.
sentences.sContent_eng: The key feature of discussion didactics is the discussion between students guided by teacher.
sentences.sCn: 讨论式教学法是一种教师引导下以学生间的讨论交流为主的教学方法。

trans.tranOther: the art or science of teaching
